WELCOME TO THE SMALL TOWN OF SKITTERING PEAKS..
  • inspired heavily by animal crossing! but if it was an adventure/horror game.. about bugs and ghosts!
  • this a small slice of a wayy bigger game I want to make! (but sadly I am only one person.. and i'm tired)
credits:

made with unity urp, blender, and a piano

  • all 3D assets were made during the jam from scratch (with the exception of a few shaders I referenced from youtube videos.. [links later])
  • I'm not that good at music but I did that too.. for some reason.

also, the end title has the wrong year.

2020.1 should be 2021!! 

Thank you sleep deprivation.
